text:
@realDonaldTrump @lgutwein99_31 So there are farmers left you haven't bankrupted? Also, just a reminder: More than 100,000 Americans have now died from Coronavirus.

You've spent your time golfing, attacking veterans, falsely accusing a man of murder & mocking Joe Biden for wearing a face mask in public. #MAGA
